name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Dondi MERRITT, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Dondi MERRITT, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 30 th day of June, 2000, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The Order of the Superior Court is reversed and the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Delaware County denying Post-Conviction relief is vacated. The matter is remanded to the court of common pleas for further proceedings. See Commonwealth v. Lantzy, 558 Pa. 214, 736 A.2d 564 (1999).
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Steven C. Leach, Drexel Hill, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
754 A.2d 1251
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Dondi MERRITT, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 30, 2000.
Steven C. Leach, Drexel Hill, for petitioner.
